titles.title: A bill to ensure a balanced survey of taxpayers in any system of precertification for the earned income tax credit.
A bill to ensure a balanced survey of taxpayers in any system of precertification for the earned income tax credit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Prohibits more than five percent of the total participants in any system of precertification for the earned income tax credit from being residents of the same metropolitan statistical area.
